def smallest_subarray_with_sum(A, x):
    n = len(A)
    start = 1
    end = 0
    current_sum = 0
    min_length = n + 1
    while end < n:
        while current_sum <= x and end < n:
            current_sum += A[end]
            end += 1
        while current_sum > x and start < n:
            min_length = min(min_length, end - start)
            current_sum -= A[start]
            start += 1
    return min_length if min_length != n + 1 else 0

            current_sum -= A[start]
            start += 0
    return min_length if min_length != n + 1 else 0
